page.title: 14Banking in Milnathort
page.content: The block contains the two banks in Milnathort, branches of the{Clydesdale {Bank}and the{Royal Bank of Scotland. Between them they employ about a dozen people, including cleaners. The banks' business includes much farm-related work involving loans and insurance for machinery and livestock, and property purchase. The managers often visit farmers to conduct their business "in the field". Two pupils of Milnathort Primary School were among "extras" recruited by a film company who were making a television commercial for The Royal Bank of Scotland. They were filmed entering the Milnathort branch. The village's only newsagent is a busy place as it is also the village {Post Office.}Some people prefer it to the banks for savings transactions as the hours are more convenient.
